Company name: UTTAR PRADESH METRO RAIL CORPORATION LIMITED
Qualifications required: B.Tech in Civil Engineering or equivalent from Govt. recognized University /Institute.
Skills required: Applicant should be working for at least two years in SAG or equivalent grade in the pay scale of Rs. 1,20,000-2,80,000 (IDA) or Rs. 1,44,200-2,18,200/Level-14 of 7th CPC Pay matrix (CDA) in Government/PSUs with a proven track record of a minimum of twenty (20) years of Group A/Executive level service (executive service in reputed Private sector will also be considered for computing 20 years service). Should have a minimum of five (5) years' experience in Planning/Construction, tendering and executing multi-disciplinary/large infrastructure projects of Metro/Railways. Desirable experience includes: underground Metro constructions including tunnels; all phases of internationally funded contracts (planning, tender document preparation, bidding, execution, commissioning, post-commissioning); complying with project related requirements of international funding institutions; coordinating and interfacing with Railway related disciplines (track installation, signaling, electrification, rolling stock etc.); safety aspects relating to railway construction including clearance and certification from Commissioner of Metro Railway Safety (CMRS). Responsibilities include overall Project Management for all civil construction activities including safety and quality control, planning, scheduling, monitoring and controlling of preliminary and final designs, tendering, track works, contract administration and commissioning, project monitoring, interface management, quality assurance and safety, cost control, land acquisition, rehabilitation, utility and traffic diversions, and arranging necessary clearances and statutory approvals.
Age limit: Upper age limit: 57 years as on closing date of vacancy notice.
Salary or compensation details: Parent pay plus Deputation Allowance on Deputation basis. Rs. 1,50,000-3,00,000/- on absorption basis.
